member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.GetFormProperties(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes)

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.GetFullTextSearchCandidatesForm(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes,System.String,System.String,Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormProgressCallback,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallback)
member.summary: Finds all the master form candidates for a form using full text search.
member.param: The form attribute object. Must not be **null**.
Repository name. If this value is **null** or an empty string, then an empty string is used to indicate a default repository without a name.
Optional language of the form. Passing **null** will default to "en-US" (or locale ID 1033).
Status about the progress of the operation at the form level (i.e. page by page). Can be **null**.
Provides status on the progress of the operation at the page level. Can be **null**.
member.returns: List of candidates sorted by rank.

member.summary: Finds all the master form candidates for a form page using full text search.
member.param: The form attribute object. Must not be **null**.
1-based page number of the form to compare.
1-based page number of the master form to compare.
Repository name. If this value is **null** or an empty string, then an empty string is used to indicate a default repository without a name.
Optional language of the form. Passing **null** will default to "en-US" (or locale ID 1033).
Status about the progress of the operation at the form level (i.e. page by page). Can be **null**.
Provides status on the progress of the operation at the page level. Can be **null**.
member.returns: List of candidates sorted by rank.

member.summary: This method is used to update internal data after setting the page type using SetPageOptions method.

The master form image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.UpsertMasterFormToFullTextSearch(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes,System.String,System.String,System.String,Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormProgressCallback,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallback)
member.summary: Adds or updates a master form to the full text search database.
member.param: Attributes of the master form. Must not be **null**.
Repository name. If this value is **null** or an empty string, then an empty string is used to indicate a default repository without a name.
Optional language of the form. Passing **null** will default to "en-US" (or locale ID 1033).
Optional user data value. This will be saved to the store and can be retrieved later when getting the candidates. Can be **null**.
Status about the progress of the operation at the form level (i.e. page by page). Can be **null**.
Provides status on the progress of the operation at the page level. Can be **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.FIPSCompatibleMode
member.summary: Enables or disables Compatible with FIPS(Federal Information Processing Standards).
member.value: **true** to enable FIPS Compatibility mode, **false**, to disable Compatibility.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.FullTextSearchManager
member.summary: Full text search manager support.
member.value: Full text search manager. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.FullTextSearchMaximumCandidates
member.summary: The maximum number of matches (candidates) to return.
member.value: The default value is 3. Must be a number greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.FullTextSearchMinimumRank
member.summary: Minimum rank value to be considered a match (or candidate).
member.value: The default value is -1 meaning to return all candidates.

member.summary: Gets a list of object managers that are used to extract the features of the form for this FormRecognitionEngine.
member.value: List of object managers that are used to extract the features of the form.

member.summary: The FormRecognitionEngine version to use when recognizing forms.

member.summary: A constant value that indicates the latest version of the forms toolkit.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of confidence that a recognition engine has when comparing a Form's attributes object with a Master Form's attributes object.
member.value: The confidence number expresses the certainty of the recognition process.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionResult.LargestConfidencePageNumber
member.summary: Specifies the index of the page which has the greatest confidence. This is a 1-based index.
member.value: The 1-based integer that specifies the index to the form page with the greatest confidence.

member.summary: The Master Form attribute founded using FormRecognitionEngine.CompareFormFast Method.
member.value: The Master Form attribute associated with result.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionResult.MasterAttributesCandidatesIndeces
member.summary: List of Master Forms indices passed to FormRecognitionEngine.CompareFormFast that could be master form associated with passed form.
member.value: List of integers that specifies the Candidates indeices of master attributes.

member.summary: Consists of a list of PageRecognitionResult objects containing the success or failure result of comparison operation for each Form page.
member.value: List representing the results of the recognition process for the different Form pages.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionResult.Reason
member.summary: Identifies the reason for the Confidence result.
member.value: Value representing the reason for the recognition result.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions
member.summary: Specifies the different options for a Form page when it is added to a form using FormRecognitionEngine.AddFormPage for Forms or FormRecognitionEngine.AddMasterFormPage for Master Forms.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PageRecognitionOptions class object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.AutoCleanUp
member.summary: Gets or sets which clean up operation (to get rid of noise) to perform on the page image before extracting its features.
member.value: true if the clean up operation is going to be performed on the form, otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.ExcludeRectangles
member.summary: List of LeadRect objects which specify the portion of the page image that is not a part of the page features.
member.value: List of LeadRect objects representing the excluded areas of the form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.IncludeRectangles
member.summary: List of LeadRect objects which specify which portion of the page image is included as a part of the page features.
member.value: List of LeadRect objects representing the included areas of the form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.PageType
member.summary: Specifies the type of Page.
member.value: The PageType of the page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.RegionOfInterestRectangles
member.summary: List of LeadRect objects which specify which portion of the page image represents the important features of the page.
member.value: List of LeadRect objects representing the important areas of the form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.SvgDocument
member.summary: The optional SVG document representation of this page.
member.value: Optional SVG document representation of this page if the original format supports loading as SVG, otherwise; **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.TradeoffMode
member.summary: Specifies which recognition algorithm trade-off setting to use for forms recognition.
member.value: The Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode setting to use for forms recognition.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.UpdateImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the update the user image with the cleaned one.
member.value: True to update the user image with the cleaned one, otherwise it is false.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionResult
member.summary: Describes the results of the comparison operation for a page, including success or failure as well as alignment results.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PageRecognitionResult class object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionResult.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of shift and scaling a Form page needs in order to match the corresponding Master Form page.
member.value: Value representing the information needed to align the Form to its Master Form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of confidence that a recognition engine has when comparing the Form page attributes object to the Master Form page attributes object.
member.value: The confidence number expressing the certainty of the recognition of the Form page.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties
member.summary: Specifies the attribute properties for a form. This class is used by the FormRecognitionEngine.GetFormProperties method.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.CreationTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time that the form's attribute was created.
member.value: The creation time of this form (2100,0050).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.Guid
member.summary: Gets or sets the form's attributes ID.
member.value: The GUID associated with this form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.IsMaster
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether these attributes are for a Master Form.
member.value: true if this is a Master Form; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.LastAccessTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time that the form's attribute was last accessed.
member.value: The time that this form was last accessed (2100,0050).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.LastModificationTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time that the form's attribute was last modified.
member.value: The time that this form was last modified (2100,0050).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the form's attributes name.
member.value: A string that is associated with this form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.Pages
member.summary: Gets or sets the form's attributes number of pages.
member.value: An integer value that specifies the number of pages in the form.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionProperties.Empty
member.summary: Represents a new instance of the FormRecognitionProperties with uninitialized members.
